org.mobicents.slee.container.component.deployment.classloading
Class ComponentClassLoaderImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      org.mobicents.slee.container.component.classloading.ComponentClassLoader
          org.mobicents.slee.container.component.deployment.classloading.ComponentClassLoaderImpl

public class ComponentClassLoaderImpl
extends ComponentClassLoader

The SLEE component class loader implementation. A component needs to have it's own class loader due to unique JNDI context but in reality it just delegates to the related domain class loader, which manages the jar where the component was deployed from.

Author:
martins
